oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A compact model for the N-well resistor
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PARIKH, CD
PATRIKAR, RM
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple and compact model is derived for the n-well resistor. The model was derived specifically for use in simulation and design of ESD protection circuits using SPICE. Hence it encompasses three regions of resistor operation: linear and velocity saturation, avalanche multiplication and snapback and high injection. Excellent fit with experimental data is found. (C) 1999 . .
